titleStmt.title: A vindication of a passage in Dr. Sherlock's sermon preached before the honourable House of Commons, May 29, 1685 : from the remarks of a late pretended remonstrance, by way of address from the Church of England, to both Houses of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
